price: 13. Kuwa yidhaahda: Rabbigayo waa Allaah, markaas toosnaada8, ma aha cabsi dushooda, mana murugoonayaan.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا ٱللَّهُ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ فَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ
footnotes: 8. Markaas ku toosnaada diinta waa ku hanuunsanaada mabaadiida towxiidka, iimaanka iyo camallada wanaagsan oo ku sugnaada.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna qālū rabbunā al-lahu thumma is'taqāmū falā khawfun ʿalayhim walā hum yaḥzanūna
